name: The  Net Impact
tag_list: web-design, web-development, internet-marketing, mobile-development, ecommerce-design, web-marketing
overview:
The Net Impact offers a wide variety of services including web design, web development, internet marketing, mobile development and ecommerce design. Creating custom solutions, The Net Impact is a one stop shop for all things web strategy.

In 2006, Unidev acquired The Net Impact to serve as the company’s web marketing division. Since then, the company has experienced exponential growth, opening new offices, hiring new employees and creating new areas of competency. The Net Impact offers web design, web development and Internet marketing services to companies of all sizes, including start-ups, small to medium-sized businesses and enterprise scale corporations.

The Net Impact maintains a full service staff including graphic designers, front and back-end developers, web marketing specialists and project managers. The Net Impact accommodates transparent communication and client involvement along with superior customer service.
